item.title: [Trending] New entry (#50): ralph-tui-prd
item.description: New entry in Trending leaderboard. Rank: #50 Installs: 277 Source: subsy/ralph-tui Description: Generate a Product Requirements Document (PRD) for ralph-tui task orchestration. Creates PRDs with user stories that can be converted to beads issues or prd.json for automated execution. Triggers on: create a prd, write prd for, plan this feature, requirements for, spec out.
